paper_abstract: A new compact planar monopole antenna which covers an ultra wide bandwidth of similar to 147% from 2.96 to 19.43 GHz for S(11) <= -10 dB is presented. The proposed antenna has simple configuration and easily fed by using a 50 Omega microstrip line. The total size of the antenna is 30 x 26 x 1.6 mm(3). (C) 2011 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Int J RF and Microwave CAE 21:216-220, 2011.
paper_title: A New Compact Planar UWB Monopole Antenna
